revised_title: The Effects of Different Types of Lime on Soil Fertility
tldr: The author investigates two types of lime used in agriculture and discovers that one type, containing calcareous earth, is beneficial to soil fertility, while the other, containing magnesia, is detrimental. The study examines the effects of these limes on plant growth and suggests that the difference in their properties is due to the presence of magnesia in the destructive lime.
